docs.lead_paragraph: Several of the Liverpool team that went down meekly 3-1 at struggling Leicester City on Monday are playing well below their best, manager Juergen Klopp said on Friday, admitting a quick reaction was needed to get their season back on track.

headline.print_headline: Klopp Urges Inconsistent Liverpool to Get Back on Track
headline.main: Klopp Urges Inconsistent Liverpool to Get Back on Track

docs.snippet: Several of the Liverpool team that went down meekly 3-1 at struggling Leicester City on Monday are playing well below their best, manager Juergen Klopp said on Friday, admitting a quick reaction was needed to get their season back on track....

docs.lead_paragraph: The Japanese company has been whetting the appetites of gamers for months. Will it be enough to persuade them to buy its new device?

docs.lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank will soon inform investors and shareholders about adjustments to its future strategy, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters, adding a capital increase was among possible tools the lender could use.

headline.print_headline: Share Sale at Deutsche Bank No Longer a Taboo: Source
headline.main: Share Sale at Deutsche Bank No Longer a Taboo: Source

docs.snippet: Deutsche Bank will soon inform investors and shareholders about adjustments to its future strategy, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters, adding a capital increase was among possible tools the lender could use....

docs.lead_paragraph: Real Madrid coach Zinedine Zidane is set be without three of his  main forwards for Saturday's trip to Eibar after Cristiano Ronaldo missed training on Friday with an ankle knock, joining the suspended Gareth Bale and Alvaro Morata on the sidelines.

headline.print_headline: Ronaldo Set to Miss Eibar Trip for Stuttering Real Madrid
headline.main: Ronaldo Set to Miss Eibar Trip for Stuttering Real Madrid

docs.lead_paragraph: The crushing weight of expectation that comes with managing Barcelona eventually proved too much for Luis Enrique, who said on Friday he felt a sense of relief after announcing his plans to walk away at the end of the season.

headline.print_headline: Luis Enrique Says Needed to 'Disconnect' From Barca's Constant Pressures

docs.lead_paragraph: Tanzanian President John Magufuli ordered the confiscation on Friday of passports belonging to foreign employees of an Indian infrastructure company managing a water project that is running late.

docs.lead_paragraph: Attorney General Jeff Sessions has been on the job less than a month but has already made some civil rights groups nervous by indicating the Justice Department will likely soften its focus on protecting voter rights and monitoring troubled police departments.

docs.lead_paragraph: Jurors in the double-murder trial of ex-NFL star Aaron Hernandez have viewed the scene where two men were fatally shot in 2012.

docs.lead_paragraph: There were multiple safety and health deficiencies at a Baltimore assisted living facility where two people perished and four others were injured Friday in a fire, state inspectors reported earlier this year.

headline.print_headline: Inspectors Cited Problems at Care Home Where Fire Killed 2
headline.main: Inspectors Cited Problems at Care Home Where Fire Killed 2
